data.name: The Damathos Clan
data.detailed_description:
SUMMARY:


This is a new classic old-school RPG by Valkyria Games, already behind such hits as Valiant: Resurrection and IronBorn.

The Damathos Clan is a family entrusted with protecting the world with their magical powers. A new menace approaches on the horizon, not only against the world they know, but against many other worlds they didn't even knew existed.

Travel across different islands, continents and worlds while in the journey to stop this threat and fulfill your duty as a Damathos!

FEATURES:


Dynamic Party System!
Dozens of skills to master and use!
Different worlds to explore!
A Special Dungeon filled with goodies!
Charismatic party members!

MORE GAMES FROM VALKYRIA


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1694830/The_Witch_Doctor/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1551330/Skyfall/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1551340/

data.short_description: Travel across different islands, continents and worlds while in the journey to stop a deadly threat and fulfill your duty as a Damathos!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
